setup.noUsersTwo: Please make sure you have Steam installed and are signed into at least one account, then click refresh.
setup.acknowledge: By clicking 'Continue', you agree to the <0>Terms of Service</0> and acknowledge that you have read our <1>Privacy Policy</1>.
setup.hero.title: The Only Steam<1/>Automation Tool<1/>You Will Ever Need
setup.hero.subtitle: Farm trading cards, unlock achievements, boost playtime, and automate your Steam experience — all in one tool.
gamesList.title: Your Games
gamesList.private.message: Unable to retrieve games list. This is usually because:
gamesList.private.reason.1: Your profile is set to private
gamesList.private.reason.2: Your game details are set to private
gamesList.private.reason.3: You have no games in your library
gamesList.private.reason.4: You are using an invalid Steam web API key
gamesList.private.reason.5: Something is blocking outbound connections (firewall, antivirus, etc)
idlingGames.title: Idling Games
idlingGames.subtitle: Games that you are currently idling will appear here
customLists.cardFarming.subtitle: Add games to this list to farm their trading cards
customLists.achievementUnlocker.subtitle: Add games to this list to unlock their achievements
customLists.achievementUnlocker.addDelay: Add a delay after unlocking this achievement
customLists.autoIdle.title: Automatic Idler
customLists.autoIdle.subtitle: Add games to this list to automatically idle them on launch
customLists.favorites.title: Favorite Games
customLists.favorites.subtitle: Add games to this list to easily access them
customLists.manualAdd.title: Add a Game
tradingCards.title: Trading Card Manager
tradingCards.subtitle: Sell your trading cards on the Steam market
tradingCards.confirmSingle: Are you sure you want to list this card?
tradingCards.confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove all active trading card listings from the Steam market?
tradingCards.lockCard: Prevent this card from being listed for sale
automation.cardFarming.progress: Idling <1>{{count}}</1> game(s) with <3>{{total}}</3> total card drop(s) remaining
automation.achievementUnlocker.delay: The next achievement will be unlocked in <1>{{timer}}</1>
automation.achievementUnlocker.scheduleW: Achievement unlocking paused due to being outside of the scheduled time and will resume again once inside the scheduled time
freeGames.title: Free Games
freeGames.subtitle: When there are free games available for you to claim, they will appear here
gameSettings.globalMaxIdleSub: The maximum amount of time (in minutes) all games should be idled for before stopping (overrides individual game settings)
gameSettings.idleSub: The maximum amount of time (in minutes) this game should be idled for before stopping
gameSettings.dropsSub: The maximum number of card drops to farm for this game before stopping
gameSettings.achievementsSub: The maximum number of achievements to unlock for this game before stopping
achievementManager.alert: Some protected achievements or statistics have been disabled. <1>Learn more</1>
achievementManager.achievements.title: Achievements
achievementManager.achievements.modal: Are you sure you want to <1>{{state}}</1> all achievements?
achievementManager.statistics.title: Statistics
settings.title: Settings
settings.general.title: General
settings.general.antiAway.description: Prevents Steam from setting your status as away while SGI is running
settings.general.freeGameNotifications.d: Get notifications about free games on Steam
settings.general.startMinimized.descript: Start SGI minimized to the system tray
settings.general.closeToTray.description: Clicking the X button will minimize SGI to the system tray instead of closing it
settings.general.useBeta.description: Beta features may be unstable, change unexpectedly, or be removed at any time. If you experience any issues when using a beta feature, please report it on GitHub
settings.general.disableTooltips.descrip: Disable non-essential tooltips in the app
settings.general.runAtStartup.descriptio: Start SGI automatically when Windows starts
settings.general.currency.description: Select which currency to use for trading card prices
settings.general.webApi.description: Use your own Steam web API key. <1>Learn more</1>
settings.general.webApi.descriptionTwo: Get your Steam Web API key from <1>https://steamcommunity.com/dev/apikey</1>
settings.general.autoRedeemFreeGames.des: Automatically redeem free games on Steam when they become available. You must be signed in via the <1>Automated Method</1> in <3>Steam Credentials</3>
settings.general.showRecommendedCarousel: Display a carousel of recommended games on the Your Games page
settings.general.showRecentCarousel.desc: Display a carousel of recently played games on the Your Games page
settings.general.showCardDropsCarousel.d: Display a carousel of games with card drops remaining on the Card Farming page
settings.cardFarming.alert: To use the Card Farming feature, please add your Steam Credentials in Settings → Steam Credentials
settings.cardFarming.listGames.descripti: Only farm games that are in your Card Farming list
settings.cardFarming.allGames.descriptio: Farm cards for all games in your library that have card drops remaining
settings.cardFarming.skipNoPlaytime.desc: Do not farm games that have zero playtime
settings.cardFarming.steamCredentials: Steam credentials are required in order to use the Card Farming and Trading Card Manager features. <1>Learn more</1>
settings.cardFarming.nextTask.descriptio: Run the next task automatically after Card Farming is complete
settings.steamCredentials.automated.desc: Retrieve and refresh your Steam credentials with the click of a button
settings.achievementUnlocker.idle.descri: Idle the current game while Achievement Unlocker is running
settings.achievementUnlocker.hidden.desc: Do not unlock achievements that are marked as hidden
settings.achievementUnlocker.schedule.de: Specify the time range during which achievements can be unlocked
settings.achievementUnlocker.interval: Unlock achievements randomly every {{min}} to {{max}} minutes
settings.achievementUnlocker.nextTask.de: Run the next task automatically after Achievement Unlocker is complete
settings.tradingCards.alert: To use the Trading Card Manager feature, please add your Steam Credentials in Settings → Steam Credentials
settings.tradingCards.sellOptions.descri: Choose the default sell price for trading cards when using the 'Sell All' button
settings.tradingCards.priceAdjustmentSub: Add or subtract <1>{{priceAdjustment}}</1> from the sale price of all sales
settings.tradingCards.sellDelaySub: Wait <1>{{sellDelay}}</1> seconds between listing each card to avoid rate limiting
settings.tradingCards.sellLimitSub: Do not sell items if the final sale price is below <1>{{sellLimitMin}}</1> or above <3>{{sellLimitMax}}</3>
settings.customization.title: Customization
settings.customization.backgroundImage.d: Set a custom background image for the app
settings.customization.theme.description: Change the appearance of the app
settings.debug.title: Debug
confirmation.logout: Are you sure you want to logout?
confirmation.resetStatistics: Are you sure you want to <1>reset</1> all statistics?
confirmation.resetSettings: Are you sure you want to reset settings to default?
confirmation.clearData: Are you sure you want to clear all data?
confirmation.steamClosed: Steam is not running. Open the Steam client to continue
proMode.modal.moreBenefits: More benefits coming in the future
proMode.modal.footer: Prices displayed are in USD and exclude taxes.
proMode.modal.cancel: Are you sure you want to cancel your PRO subscription? You will lose access to PRO features immediately.
toast.mismatch: Account mismatch between Steam and SGI
toast.missingCredentials: Missing card farming credentials in "Settings → Steam Credentials"
toast.outdatedCredentials: Card farming credentials need to be updated in "Settings → Steam Credentials"
toast.enableAllGames: Add some games to your card farming list or enable "all games" in "Settings → Card Farming"
toast.noGames: There are no games in your list
toast.refetch.cooldown: Games can be refreshed again at {{time}}
toast.stopIdleAll.error: Failed to stop idling all game(s)
toast.apiKey.save: Steam web API key saved successfully
toast.apiKey.error: Unable to validate Steam web API key
toast.apiKey.clear: Steam web API key cleared successfully
toast.resetSettings.success: Settings have been reset to default
toast.tradingCards.noCards: Unable to find any trading cards in your Steam inventory
toast.tradingCards.processing: Processing your request. This might take a second..
toast.tradingCards.emailConfirm: Successfully listed {{count}} card(s) for sale. Confirm the listing via email
toast.tradingCards.mobileConfirm: Successfully listed {{count}} card(s) for sale. Confirm the listing via the Steam mobile app
toast.tradingCards.rateLimit: Rate limited when fetching card prices
toast.tradingCards.noListings: No active trading card listings found
toast.tradingCards.removedListings: Removed {{count}} of {{total}} active trading card listings from the Steam market
toast.tradingCards.failedRemove: Failed to remove active trading card listings from the Steam market
toast.tradingCards.priceOutOfRange: Card price {{price}} is outside of the sell limits ({{min}} - {{max}})
toast.tradingCards.cardLocked: Card is locked and cannot be listed for sale
toast.tradingCards.skippedCards: Skipped {{count}} card(s) that are locked or outside of the sell limits
toast.tradingCards.allCardsLocked: All cards are locked and cannot be listed for sale
toast.tradingCards.allCardsOutOfRange: All cards are outside of the sell limits and cannot be listed for sale
toast.tradingCards.cooldown: Please wait {{cooldown}} seconds before fetching more card prices
common.error: An error occurred. Check the logs for more information
